comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: Hillary Clinton, whenever Trump speaks of your husband, Bill Clinton, reply and hold up (1 ) one finger, you only had One Marriage, what was weak, is now Stronger Together! **Endurance BILL to Last! Stronger Together, One Marriage! Prophetess Jessica M. #OneMarriage #StrongerTogether #hillaryclinton #Prophetess #Jessica #BillClinton #EnduranceBilltoLast
